name: mmc-mcp-bridge
description: Enterprise MCP Orchestration Platform - 24+ MCP Servers + Intelligent Agent
author: MyMind Ventures <hello@mymindventures.io>

scripts.precommit: npm run type-check && npm run build
scripts.docker:tag:dev: docker tag mmc-mcp-bridge-dev:latest mymindventures/mmc-mcp-bridge-dev:latest && docker tag mmc-mcp-bridge-dev:latest mymindventures/mmc-mcp-bridge-dev:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.docker:tag:app: docker tag mmc-mcp-bridge-app:latest mymindventures/mmc-mcp-bridge-app:latest && docker tag mmc-mcp-bridge-app:latest mymindventures/mmc-mcp-bridge-app:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.docker:tag:e2e: docker tag mmc-mcp-bridge-e2e:latest mymindventures/mmc-mcp-bridge-e2e:latest && docker tag mmc-mcp-bridge-e2e:latest mymindventures/mmc-mcp-bridge-e2e:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.docker:tag:all: npm run docker:tag:dev && npm run docker:tag:app && npm run docker:tag:e2e
scripts.docker:push:dev:hub: docker push mymindventures/mmc-mcp-bridge-dev:latest && docker push mymindventures/mmc-mcp-bridge-dev:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.docker:push:app:hub: docker push mymindventures/mmc-mcp-bridge-app:latest && docker push mymindventures/mmc-mcp-bridge-app:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.docker:push:e2e:hub: docker push mymindventures/mmc-mcp-bridge-e2e:latest && docker push mymindventures/mmc-mcp-bridge-e2e:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.docker:push:all:hub: npm run docker:push:dev:hub && npm run docker:push:app:hub && npm run docker:push:e2e:hub
scripts.docker:push:all:ghcr: npm run docker:push:dev:ghcr && npm run docker:push:app:ghcr && npm run docker:push:e2e:ghcr
scripts.docker:clean:images: docker images | grep 'mmc-mcp-bridge\|mymindventures/mmc-mcp-bridge' | awk '{print $3}' | xargs -r docker rmi -f || true
scripts.docker:clean:containers: docker ps -a | grep 'mmc-mcp-bridge' | awk '{print $1}' | xargs -r docker rm -f || true
scripts.docker:clean:volumes: docker volume ls | grep 'mmc-mcp-bridge' | awk '{print $2}' | xargs -r docker volume rm || true
scripts.docker:clean:all: npm run docker:clean:containers && npm run docker:clean:images && npm run docker:clean:volumes
scripts.docker:validate:dev: docker compose config --services | grep -q dev && echo '✅ Dev service configured' || echo '❌ Dev service missing'
scripts.docker:validate:app: docker compose config --services | grep -q app && echo '✅ App service configured' || echo '❌ App service missing'
scripts.docker:validate:e2e: docker compose config --services | grep -q e2e && echo '✅ E2E service configured' || echo '❌ E2E service missing'
scripts.docker:validate:all: npm run docker:validate:dev && npm run docker:validate:app && npm run docker:validate:e2e
scripts.docker:inspect:dev: docker inspect mmc-mcp-bridge-dev:latest 2>/dev/null | grep -A 20 Labels || echo 'Image not found'
scripts.docker:inspect:app: docker inspect mmc-mcp-bridge-app:latest 2>/dev/null | grep -A 20 Labels || echo 'Image not found'
scripts.docker:inspect:e2e: docker inspect mmc-mcp-bridge-e2e:latest 2>/dev/null | grep -A 20 Labels || echo 'Image not found'
scripts.docker:test:dev: docker compose up -d dev && sleep 10 && curl -f http://localhost:3000/api/health || exit 1
scripts.docker:test:app: docker compose up -d app && sleep 15 && curl -f http://localhost:3001/api/health || exit 1
scripts.docker:test:all: npm run docker:test:dev && npm run docker:test:app
scripts.docker:validate: docker compose config --quiet && echo '✅ docker-compose.yml is valid'
scripts.cicd:validate: npm run type-check && npm run build && npm run docker:validate && echo '✅ All CI/CD validations passed'
